dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 768 IH: To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for Miami Lakes, Florida.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Diaz-Balart introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for Miami Lakes, Florida.

section.header: ZIP Code for Miami Lakes, Florida
section.text: Not later than September 30, 2017, the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP code for, as nearly as practicable, for Miami Lakes, Florida.
